Place downloaded copies here:
- aframe.min.js  (https://aframe.io/releases/1.5.0/aframe.min.js)
- aframe-extras.min.js (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/c-frame/aframe-extras/master/dist/aframe-extras.min.js)

Download commands (macOS/Linux):

curl -L https://aframe.io/releases/1.5.0/aframe.min.js -o aframe.min.js
curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/c-frame/aframe-extras/master/dist/aframe-extras.min.js -o aframe-extras.min.js

Then reload the page; the loader tries local files first.
